text: Hagi Israeli vahe'ma agupofima nemani'za vahe'mo'zane, Jodanima mani'za vu'naza vahe'mo'zama kazama, Israeli sondia vahe'mo'za frazageno, Soli'ene maka mofavre'aramine, hanko'are'ma azerinentea ne'ma, agranema vu'naza vahetamima fri vagarazage'za, kumazamia atre'za frazageno, Filistia vahe'mo'za ana kuma'zmia eme eri'za mani'naze.
